name: OVERSPAWN
description:
Overspawn was made for BlackThornProd game jam #3.

Less pollution is more joy! Overspawn is a mini game about protect the nature, try to keep pollution out of the picturesque island by avoiding industrialization. The clock is ticking, don't let time run out. Every choice you make will affect the score, choose wisely and Have fun!

[How to play] 

Dray anywhere to move the camera

Click the ui button below to spawn objects you like

Score 500 points to win

Game is over when timer drop to 0

[Credit]

Royalty free music

https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/the-elevator-bossa-nova

https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/click/  (select click)

other assets of the game are custom made.
